steps.title: Draw a shape with three edges on the left side and a curve on the right for the back of the ship.
steps.content: Draw a shape with three edges on the left side and a curve on the right for the back of the ship.

steps.title: Replicate the shape draw earlier, but with a smaller scale and the curve facing the left for the front of the ship.
steps.content: Replicate the shape draw earlier, but with a smaller scale and the curve facing the left for the front of the ship.

steps.title: Draw another curve to complete the back of the ship.
steps.content: Draw another curve to complete the back of the ship.

steps.title: Draw a series of intersecting lines for the mast.
steps.content: Draw a series of intersecting lines for the mast.

steps.title: Draw a series of curve shapes for the sails.
steps.content: Draw a series of curve shapes for the sails.

steps.title: Draw a set of lines and curves to add the details of the ship.
steps.content: Draw a set of lines and curves to add the details of the ship.

steps.title: Based on the outline, Draw the main sections of the ship.
steps.content: Based on the outline, Draw the main sections of the ship.

steps.title: Add details to the ship such as windows, flags, the sail streaks, and banner.
steps.content: Add details to the ship such as windows, flags, the sail streaks, and banner.

steps.title: Erase the unnecessary lines within the ship's outline and all around.
steps.content: Erase the unnecessary lines within the ship's outline and all around.

steps.title: Draw a wavy or jagged line below the ship for the water.
steps.content: Draw a wavy or jagged line below the ship for the water.

steps.title: Color your ship!
steps.content: Color your ship!

steps.title: Draw a shape with 4 edges similar to an inverted triangle.
steps.content: Draw a shape with 4 edges similar to an inverted triangle.

steps.title: Draw two lines that merge at the right end to complete the hull of the battleship.
steps.content: Draw two lines that merge at the right end to complete the hull of the battleship.

steps.title: Draw a set of regular and slanted rectangles for the “bridge”.
steps.content: Draw a set of regular and slanted rectangles for the “bridge”.

steps.title: Draw lines connecting the rectangles drawn earlier to complete the “bridge”.
steps.content: Draw lines connecting the rectangles drawn earlier to complete the “bridge”.

steps.title: Draw curves with cylinders attached for the guns.
steps.content: Draw curves with cylinders attached for the guns.

steps.title: Based on the outline, complete the battleship and erase any unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Based on the outline, complete the battleship and erase any unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Add the details such as windows, a flag at the backside, and the anchor.
steps.content: Add the details such as windows, a flag at the backside, and the anchor.

steps.title: Draw a rugged, wavy line below the ship for the water.
steps.content: Draw a rugged, wavy line below the ship for the water.

steps.title: Color your battleship!
steps.content: Color your battleship!
